archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Timetabling, Syllabus Plus
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: On premise. Every student is given a timetable of their activies (lectures, etc.) at UWE, including the room location. Generation of these is a complex process with room availablity, lecturer availability, course size and course structure needing to be factored in. However, it is essential that the students are given their timetables in a timely manner and that the timetables can then be used by the students with confidence that they are accurate. The timetables are published in a number of online and printed formats, with multiple views for the student, lecturer and room planners.
